game.name: 100 Rogues
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A traditional roguelike with 4 player classes, each with a suite of tactical skills. Outmaneuver hordes of monsters armed with daggers, fireballs, poisonous gummi rats and grenade launchers. Tactical thinking and planning are essential! Go Kill Satan!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A traditional roguelike with 4 player classes, each with a suite of tactical skills. Outmaneuver hordes of monsters armed with daggers, fireballs, poisonous gummi rats and grenade launchers. Tactical thinking and planning are essential! Go Kill Satan!
game.developers: Keith Burgun, Wes Osborne-Paugh, Blake Reynolds
